cleaned_text: Food Additives 2 12+ Check the safety of your food. [ IGRASS PTY LTD ](https://apps.apple.com/es/developer/igrass-pty-ltd/id287917151?l=en-GB) Designed for iPad - - Screenshots Description Avoid food additives that are potentially dangerous or unsafe to your health & see which ones are considered safe. Take control of what you eat today. This application is perfect for those at risk, the health conscious, parents, may have revolutionized the mass production of the food that we consume, but at what cost to your health? Fully searchable, this app lets you quickly & easily access the general information of 450+ food additives (no internet connection required!).
